itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying waragon or cheetah hide. It requires the knowledge of Drying: Beginner.

※ Find Techthon in Heidel and complete the Need for Soft Hide! Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Waragon Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted Waragon corpse.

item.name: Cheetah Dragon Hide
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Tanning a hunted Cheetah Dragon corpse.

item.name: Fancy Fur
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying waragon or cheetah hide.

item.name: [Valkyrie] Garner Traveling Players Costume
item.desc:
A clown costume used by the Garner Traveling Players. It has a peculiar charm to it.

- Item Effect: Amity +15% from a conversation

※ If you use a costume exchange coupon, you will get the same item with an additional effect of Movement Speed +2. The costume can be equipped in the same slot as a pearl costume.

If you exchange it for a costume, you cannot register it to the Item Marketplace.

item.name: Azwell Amulet of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Azwell Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Amulet of Temptation, Azwell Amulet

item.name: Azwell Amulet of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Azwell Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Amulet of Destruction, Azwell Amulet

item.name: Azwell Amulet of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Azwell Amulet.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Amulet of Crimson Flame, Azwell Amulet

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Amulet
item.desc:
A Demihuman Amulet developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Demihuman Amulet.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Amulet of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Amulet of Destruction, Demihuman Amulet of Temptation, Demihuman Amulet

item.name: Demihuman Amulet
item.desc: An amulet made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Azwell Amulet
item.desc: An amulet custom-made for the commander of the Militia.

item.name: Yuria Amulet
item.desc: An amulet possessed with a hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Bares Amulet
item.desc: An amulet possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Kalis Amulet
item.desc: An amulet capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Supreme Fancy Fur
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Shaking Fine Fancy Fur and Fur Glaze, an ingredient made through Alchemy. It requires the knowledge of Shaking: Skilled.

※ Shaking: Skilled can be obtained as a challenge reward after achieving Processing Artisan Level 1.
